publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4205 Jackie Baillie: Midwives Win Gold Standard—That the Parliament congratulates the midwifery team at the Vale of Leven Hospital on the recent recognition of its gold standard service for all its mums and babies; notes that the specialised team at the Community Maternity Unit scored almost 100% in every category of the UNICEF Baby Friendly Initiative; further notes that this award, which will be delivered later this year, recognises top level care provided to pregnant women and new mums, and applauds all the continued hard work and high standards of everyone involved with the midwifery team at the hospital.

S3M-4205 Jackie Baillie: Midwives Win Gold Standard—That the Parliament congratulates the midwifery team at the Vale of Leven Hospital on the recent recognition of its gold standard service for all its mums and babies; notes that the specialised team at the Community Maternity Unit scored almost 100% in every category of the UNICEF Baby Friendly Initiative; further notes that this award, which will be delivered later this year, recognises top level care provided to pregnant women and new mums, and applauds all the continued hard work and high standards of everyone involved with the midwifery team at the hospital. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Butler*, Jackson Carlaw*, Robin Harper*, Marlyn Glen*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Tolson*, Gil Paterson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Ross Finnie*, Sarah Boyack*, Mary Scanlon*, James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4205 Midwives Win Gold Standard (lodged on 20 May 2009) Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Aileen Cam pbell*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4205 Midwives Win Gold Standard (lodged on 20 May 2009) Des McNulty*
S3M-4205 Midwives Win Gold Standard (lodged on 20 May 2009) Cathy Jamieson*, Tom McCabe*
S3M-4205 Midwives Win Gold Standard (lodged on 20 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4205 Midwives Win Gold Standard (lodged on 20 May 2009) Rhoda Grant*
